resources.string: We are not able to correctly Identify the character that you have drawn and in order to Improve the accuracy of the software,we would like you to choose the correct character that you had intended to draw.

HOW TO USE

This is a Handwriting Recognition App which is in beta phase. In order to use the app,see the following instructions

  • You must draw a character one at a time including its corresponing maatra e.g ক
  • after drawing a character wait for about 1 sec for it to be recognized.and then proceed with the second character


Correction

The app maynot correctly recognise the character initially , the user may then press on the Correct button to select the corresponding correct character, On pressing the correct button,user should then select which he/she thinks is the correct character. The vowel modifiers are associated with the character ক so as to display them(vowel modifiers unicode need to be combined with other values to be displayed).

If however the character is not recognised as any valid character the program will automatically display the correction dialog for the user.

Space button
For giving spaces in the text area

Backspace button
for giving backspaces in the text area

SMS/EMAIL
This button is used to forward the text as either sms or email

Combine
The combine button is used to combine two letters to form compound character(JUKTAKHOR). In order to combine two characters such as ক and ত = ক্ত .depending on the unicode support of the android library ,sometimes rendering problem might occur while rendering the compound character. to combine ক and ত = ক্ত we just draw ক followed by ত and then press combine which will affect the last two characters to form ক্ত.
